confirmClose.title: Confirm Close
confirmClose.content: After closing, the filled content will be lost. Are you sure to close?

tips.workSaved: Please select the account to publish
tips.pcNotSupported: Web does not support this platform, please download the App to publish
tips.accountOffline: This account is offline and cannot be published
tips.tiktokForbidden: This platform does not support publishing yet
tips.xhsOffline: Xiaohongshu account is offline, please download the App to operate

form.title: Title
form.sourcePlaceholder: Please specify source, time, location (e.g. from https://www.xxxx.com/yyyy)

validation.facebookStoryNoDes: Facebook Story does not support description
validation.facebookReelNoImage: Facebook Reel does not support image upload
validation.instagramStoryNoDes: Instagram Story does not support description
validation.instagramReelNoImage: Instagram Reel does not support image upload
validation.instagramPostNoVideo: Instagram post does not support video upload
validation.topicFormatError: Topics in description must be separated by spaces, such as: "#topic1 #topic2"
validation.sourceRequired: Source must be filled when reprinting!
validation.imageOnly: Images already exist, you can only upload more images, not videos!
validation.videoOnly: Videos already exist, you can only upload more videos, not images!
validation.imageVideoMixed: Images and videos cannot be uploaded together!
validation.onlyImageOrVideo: Only image or video files can be uploaded!
validation.videoMaxExceeded: The number of videos uploaded cannot exceed {{maxCount}}
validation.instagramImageValidation: For best results on your Instagram Grid and Feed, we recommend uploading images with a 4:5 aspect ratio.
validation.facebookReelDuration: Facebook Reel video duration must be 3–90 seconds
validation.facebookStoryDuration: Facebook Story video duration must be 3–4 hours
validation.instagramReelDuration: Instagram Reel video duration must be 5 seconds–15 minutes
validation.instagramStoryDuration: Instagram Story video duration must be 3–60 seconds
validation.threadsVideoDuration: Threads video duration must be greater than 0 and no more than 5 minutes
validation.threadsImageMin: Threads requires at least two images
validation.pinterestVideoDuration: Pinterest video duration must be 4 seconds–15 minutes
validation.tiktokVideoDuration: TikTok video duration must be 3 seconds to 10 minutes
validation.twitterVideoDuration: Twitter video duration must be 0.5–140 seconds
validation.facebookPostImageSize: Facebook Post image size cannot exceed 10MB
validation.facebookStoryImageSize: Facebook Story image size cannot exceed 4MB
validation.tiktokImageResolution: TikTok image max resolution is 1080x1920 or 1920x1080

messages.contentModerationFailed: Content moderation failed, please try again later
messages.platformNotSupportedDirect: Direct authorization for {{platform}} platform is not supported yet

commercial.title: Disclose video content
commercial.toggle: Turn on to disclose that this video promotes goods orservices in exchange for something of value. Your video
commercial.yourBrand: Your Brand - You are promoting yourself or your own business. This content will be classified as Brand Organic.
commercial.brandedContent: Branded Content - You are promoting another brand or a third party. This content will be classified as Branded Content.

compliance.default: By posting, you agree to TikTok's Music Usage Confirmation.
compliance.organic: By posting, you agree to TikTok's Music Usage Confirmation.
compliance.branded: By posting, you agree to TikTok's Branded Content Policy and Music Usage Confirmation.
compliance.both: By posting, you agree to TikTok's Branded Content Policy and Music Usage Confirmation.
